result.title: Beach Soccer friendly against Qatar 2
result.subTitle: Barcelona and their contingent of Spanish internationals will play a Beach Soccer friendly against Qatar
result.description:
The Spanish League giants are due to take on the Qatar national team on 28 March, the final day of the FIFA Beach Soccer World Cup 2015 Asia qualifiers in Doha.

The Asian qualifiers begin on 23 March with the top three teams qualifying for the World Cup.

The friendly will be a valuable contest for Barcelona, who feature many of Spain’s top Beach Soccer stars.

Among those players are Beach Soccer icon Ramiro Figueiras Amarelle, Spanish keeper Francisco Jesus Donaire, the reigning Golden Glove award winner, as well as forward Llorenç Gomez, defenders Raul Merida, Juan Martin Lima and Nicolás Alvarado Caporale and winger Daniel Pajón Gómez winger among others.

Spain have already qualified for the Baku 2015 European Games.
